sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function AdminForm({id: key, updateRecipe, recipes, removeRecipe}) { const recette = recipes[key] function handleChange(event, key) { const {name, value} = event.target const recette = recipes[key] recette[name] = value updateRecipe(key, recette) } return(
handleChange(e, key)} type="text" name="nom" placeholder='Nom de la recette'/> handleChange(e, key)} type="text" name="image" placeholder="Adresse de l'image"/>
